title: How to Make a Pill Case from Plastic Bottle Caps

steps.headline: Cut a rectangular piece of plastic out of the flat part of a plastic bottle, as shown.
steps.description: Adjust to fit snugly inside the cap (about 10.5 cm x 2 cm).

steps.headline: Put a little glue on the side that will go into the cap, and insert.
Cover with another cap of the same size.
Decorate the lid with plastic beads as you wish.

text: Cut a rectangular piece of plastic out of the flat part of a plastic bottle, as shown. Adjust to fit snugly inside the cap (about 10.5 cm x 2 cm). Put a little glue on the side that will go into the cap, and insert.  Cover with another cap of the same size.  Decorate the lid with plastic beads as you wish.
